        protected void doRun(TestSuite testSuite)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: TestContext
        Executes the specified test suite and logs the results. The default implementation runs all the test cases.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        java.lang.Exception

      • doAssert

        protected boolean doAssert(boolean value,
                           java.lang.CharSequence message)
        Description copied from class: TestContext
        Asserts the specified value is true. The default implementation logs an error message including the code location of the assert if the assert checks fails. For example:[code] [error] NaN expected but found Infinity at javolution.TextTestSuite$DoubleParseDouble.validate(TextTestSuite.java:389) [/code]
        Overrides:
        doAssert in class TestContext
        Parameters:
        value - the boolean value to be tested.
        message - the message to be displayed if assert fails (can be null).
        Returns:
        the specified value.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        message - the message itself.
